p: The cumulative aetiological fraction of the standardised and site-specific ten most common pathogens accounted for between 79路0% and 90路0% of the aetiological fraction at every site ( figure 6). By contrast, the cumulative aetiological fraction of the ten focus pathogens ranged by site from 55路1% to 86路6%, reflecting heterogeneity across the sites in the rank order of each pathogen ( appendix). The distribution of the individual case aetiological probability for each pathogen, for the case-specific leading pathogen, and for any virus by site are provided in the appendix.
